DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare effect leucovorin calcium fluorouracil without irinotecan 3 year survival rate overall survival patient resect node positive colon cancer high risk recurrence . - Compare toxicity regimens patient . - Compare quality life patient . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord center , disease type ( occlusion v perforation v N2 ) , delay surgery chemotherapy ( 28 day less vs 28 day ) , age ( 65 vs 65 ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive leucovorin calcium IV 2 hour fluorouracil IV 22 hour day 1 2 . - Arm II : Patients receive irinotecan IV 90 minute day 1 follow leucovorin calcium fluorouracil arm I . Treatment repeat every 14 day 12 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Quality life assess treatment , 6 12 course , 1 year . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year , every 6 month 3 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 400 patient ( 200 per arm ) accrue study within 3 year .
